service.name: Free Diagnosis of Your Personal Trackers
service.visible: A new option appears on the yellow sticky in the MedCommons Viewer
service.comment: The Personal Tracker Platform service must be installed
service.explanation: Your Trackers are analyzed and a report is inserted into your MedCommons Account
service.technical: The CINA Service is called with the 'Current CCR', using the XXXX from Lewis Pringle and Records for Living
